author: dgaudet
msg: r->finfo isn't a scratch space, it contains information about r->filename
so create a scratch space when we need to scratch.

author: randy
msg: Abstract read() and write() to the ap library to make it easier
to add in different types of read/write libraries in a central
location. This mainly keeps buff.c less messy with #ifdefs.
